issue.title: [Java] Fix the set method of FixedSizeBinaryVector
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6117](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6117). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For the set method, if the parameter is null, it should clear the validity bit. However, the current implementation throws a NullPointerException.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6117?focusedCommentId=16903895) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4995
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4995>
